languages.text: Те, кому повезло уцелеть, могли рассказать немногое. Они помнили жуткий вой, стоявший в воздухе, и невозможно быструю для своих размеров машину смерти, раздиравшую людей на части и сминавшую танки своими жуткими манипуляторами. Сей враг был древним, коварным и абсолютно безумным — ярость и ненависть затмевали разум этого еретика, ныне заключенного в темнице металла и мутировавшей плоти.

traits.locale_text: Те, кому повезло уцелеть, могли рассказать немногое. Они помнили жуткий вой, стоявший в воздухе, и невозможно быструю для своих размеров машину смерти, раздиравшую людей на части и сминавшую танки своими жуткими манипуляторами. Сей враг был древним, коварным и абсолютно безумным — ярость и ненависть затмевали разум этого еретика, ныне заключенного в темнице металла и мутировавшей плоти.

languages.text: Those lucky enough to have escaped with their lives had little to tell us. They remembered a terrible howl hanging in the air and a death machine, impossibly quick for its size, dismembering people and crumpling tanks with its horrific manipulators. This enemy was ancient, devious, and utterly mad — the heretic's mind was clouded by rage and hatred, and his body was bound within a prison of metal and mutated flesh.
languages.original_text: Те, кому повезло уцелеть, могли рассказать немногое. Сей враг был древним, коварным и абсолютно безумным — ярость и ненависть затмевали разум этого еретика, ныне заключенного в темнице металла и мутировавшей плоти.

This enemy was ancient, devious, and utterly mad — the heretic's mind was clouded by rage and hatred, and his body was bound within a prison of metal and mutated flesh.

languages.text: 那些有幸逃过一劫的人没能提供什么有用的线索。他们只记得到处传来可怕的嚎叫声，看到了一台巨大的死亡机器，动作灵活得令人难以置信。那台机器用它可怕的利爪肢解士兵、砸扁坦克。那位敌人既古老，又奸诈，而且彻底失去了理智——那个异端分子的头脑被愤怒与仇恨蒙蔽，他的身体被束缚在金属与变异血肉构成的牢笼中。
languages.original_text: Those lucky enough to have escaped with their lives had little to tell us. They remembered a terrible howl hanging in the air and a death machine, impossibly quick for its size, dismembering people and crumpling tanks with its horrific manipulators. This enemy was ancient, devious, and utterly mad — the heretic's mind was clouded by rage and hatred, and his body was bound within a prison of metal and mutated flesh.

traits.locale_text: 那些有幸逃过一劫的人没能提供什么有用的线索。他们只记得到处传来可怕的嚎叫声，看到了一台巨大的死亡机器，动作灵活得令人难以置信。那台机器用它可怕的利爪肢解士兵、砸扁坦克。那位敌人既古老，又奸诈，而且彻底失去了理智——那个异端分子的头脑被愤怒与仇恨蒙蔽，他的身体被束缚在金属与变异血肉构成的牢笼中。

languages.text: Les quelques chanceux qui avaient réussi à s'enfuir n'avaient pas grand-chose à nous apprendre. Ils se rappelaient un hurlement terrible résonnant dans l'air et une machine de mort, incroyablement rapide pour sa taille, qui démembrait les gens et écrasait les blindés avec ses terrifiants manipulateurs. Cet ennemi était ancien, perfide et complètement fou ; l'esprit de l'hérétique était embrumé par la rage et la haine, tandis que son corps était enfermé dans une prison de métal et de chair mutante.
languages.original_text: Those lucky enough to have escaped with their lives had little to tell us. They remembered a terrible howl hanging in the air and a death machine, impossibly quick for its size, dismembering people and crumpling tanks with its horrific manipulators. This enemy was ancient, devious, and utterly mad — the heretic's mind was clouded by rage and hatred, and his body was bound within a prison of metal and mutated flesh.

traits.locale_text: Les quelques chanceux qui avaient réussi à s'enfuir n'avaient pas grand-chose à nous apprendre. Ils se rappelaient un hurlement terrible résonnant dans l'air et une machine de mort, incroyablement rapide pour sa taille, qui démembrait les gens et écrasait les blindés avec ses terrifiants manipulateurs. Cet ennemi était ancien, perfide et complètement fou ; l'esprit de l'hérétique était embrumé par la rage et la haine, tandis que son corps était enfermé dans une prison de métal et de chair mutante.

languages.text: 命からがら逃げ延びた幸運な者たちは、ほとんど話すこともなかった。彼らが覚えているのは空中に渦巻く恐ろしい遠吠えと、大きさの割にあり得ないほど素早い死の機械、人々をバラバラに、戦車をぐちゃぐちゃにした恐ろしいマニピュレイターだけだった。この敵は古代から存在し、狡猾で、完全に狂っていた――異端者の心は怒りと憎しみで曇り、身体は金属と変異した肉の牢獄に縛られていた。
languages.original_text: Those lucky enough to have escaped with their lives had little to tell us. They remembered a terrible howl hanging in the air and a death machine, impossibly quick for its size, dismembering people and crumpling tanks with its horrific manipulators. This enemy was ancient, devious, and utterly mad — the heretic's mind was clouded by rage and hatred, and his body was bound within a prison of metal and mutated flesh.

traits.locale_text: 命からがら逃げ延びた幸運な者たちは、ほとんど話すこともなかった。彼らが覚えているのは空中に渦巻く恐ろしい遠吠えと、大きさの割にあり得ないほど素早い死の機械、人々をバラバラに、戦車をぐちゃぐちゃにした恐ろしいマニピュレイターだけだった。この敵は古代から存在し、狡猾で、完全に狂っていた――異端者の心は怒りと憎しみで曇り、身体は金属と変異した肉の牢獄に縛られていた。

languages.text: Los que habían logrado escapar con vida no podían contarnos mucho. Solo recordaban un terrible aullido que llenaba el aire y una máquina letal, inmensa a la par que imposiblemente rápida, que descuartizaba a la gente y aplastaba tanques con sus espantosos manipuladores. Era un enemigo anciano, astuto y completamente loco. La mente del hereje estaba nublada por la ira y el odio, mientras que su cuerpo era una prisión de metal y carne mutada.
languages.original_text: Those lucky enough to have escaped with their lives had little to tell us. They remembered a terrible howl hanging in the air and a death machine, impossibly quick for its size, dismembering people and crumpling tanks with its horrific manipulators. This enemy was ancient, devious, and utterly mad — the heretic's mind was clouded by rage and hatred, and his body was bound within a prison of metal and mutated flesh.

traits.locale_text: Los que habían logrado escapar con vida no podían contarnos mucho. Solo recordaban un terrible aullido que llenaba el aire y una máquina letal, inmensa a la par que imposiblemente rápida, que descuartizaba a la gente y aplastaba tanques con sus espantosos manipuladores. Era un enemigo anciano, astuto y completamente loco. La mente del hereje estaba nublada por la ira y el odio, mientras que su cuerpo era una prisión de metal y carne mutada.

languages.text: Die glücklichen Überlebenden hatten uns wenig zu erzählen. Sie erinnerten sich daran, dass ein schreckliches Heulen in der Luft hing. Und an eine Todesmaschine, die für ihre Größe unmöglich schnell war. Mit ihren grauenhaften Manipulatoren verstümmelte sie Menschen und zerquetschte Panzer. Dieser Feind war uralt, heimtückisch und vollkommen wahnsinnig. Der Verstand des Ketzers war durch Zorn und Hass vernebelt, und sein Körper war in einem Gefängnis aus Metall und mutiertem Fleisch eingesperrt.
languages.original_text: Those lucky enough to have escaped with their lives had little to tell us. languages.text: Canını kurtaracak kadar talihli olanlar ise bize pek bir şey anlatamadı. Havada korkunç bir ulumanın yankılandığını anımsadıklarını; boyutuna göre inanılmaz çevik bir ölüm makinesinin, dehşet verici çevirteçlerini kullanarak insanları parçaladığını ve tankları ezip geçtiğini söylediler. Bu düşman; kadim, sinsi ve mantık sınırlarından yoksundu. Kâfirin zihni öfke ve nefretle dolup taşarken bedeniyse mutasyona uğramış ten ve metalden oluşan bir zindana hapsolmuştu.
languages.original_text: Those lucky enough to have escaped with their lives had little to tell us. They remembered a terrible howl hanging in the air and a death machine, impossibly quick for its size, dismembering people and crumpling tanks with its horrific manipulators. This enemy was ancient, devious, and utterly mad — the heretic's mind was clouded by rage and hatred, and his body was bound within a prison of metal and mutated flesh.
